fields_of_interest: Trade, Energy, Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Trans-European Networks, Food Safety, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: European Maritime Policy, European Ports Policy, European Transportation Policy.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
Stena Line is one of the biggest ferry shipping companies in Europe and connects 10 countries with 21 routes and 38 vessels. Every year Stena Lines moves approximately 7 million freight units, 2 million passengers and 1.5 million cars. Stena Line employs approximately 5,500 staff and crew. 
 
Stena Line is part of the Stena AB Group which is a family owned conglomerate.
relevant_communication: Many of our projects are described in the sustainability review that can be found here: https://www.stenaline.com/our-sustainable-journey
